configuration.name: (command version) docker build & run IamBuildSystemTester
configuration.folderName: (TEST | IamBuildSystemTester) LPM test user script in isolation

option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: docker build -f build_system/test/Dockerfile.build_system_test -t lpm.ubuntu20.buildsystem.test . && docker run --name IamBuildSystemTester -t -i --rm lpm.ubuntu20.buildsystem.test
